stories.title: Sidestep Windows 11's Microsoft Account Requirement with Rufus Beta

stories.text:
I've been looking for a really good car stereo setup for my car and looks like its either super expensive or very basic.

Is it really hard to make a car PC setup with raspberry pi sort of a unit and ship it with a really good user interface?

And is CarPlay is a paid service that I need to purchase if I want to build my own hardware?
stories.title: Ask HN: Is it really hard to make a good car stereo setup?

stories.text:
Typescript lib of a friend startup (askui) that can automate anything with computer vision from UI tests to playing games.

I personally use it to scrape the web or test flutter apps.
stories.title: Show HN: (Test-)Automation with Computer Vision
Two Perspectives on Fossil Fuels and Emissions – The Methane Problem
